data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: White attacks immediately, sacrificing the white knight for two pawns, although generally White would need three pawns for the knight to have material equality. Before ____ this ____, White has ____ calculate ____ make ____ he ____ going ____ gain ____ that ____ for ____ lost ____. In this case, as the following moves show, White knows that he will gain an attack on the enemy king, forcing Black to either surrender more material or allow checkmate.
data.partBlankContent: White attacks immediately, sacrificing the white knight for two pawns, although generally White would need three pawns for the knight to have material equality. Before mak___ this sacr_____, White has t_ calculate t_ make su__ he i_ going t_ gain some_____ that compe______ for t__ lost mate____. In this case, as the following moves show, White knows that he will gain an attack on the enemy king, forcing Black to either surrender more material or allow checkmate.
data.fullContent: White attacks immediately, sacrificing the white knight for two pawns, although generally White would need three pawns for the knight to have material equality. Before making this sacrifice, White has to calculate to make sure he is going to gain something that compensates for the lost material. In this case, as the following moves show, White knows that he will gain an attack on the enemy king, forcing Black to either surrender more material or allow checkmate.
data.answer: 白棋立即攻击，牺牲白棋骑士2个兵，虽然白棋骑士通常需要3个兵才能获得质的平等。在做出这种牺牲之前，白棋必须计算以确保他将获得一些东西来弥补失去的质。在这种情况下，如下棋所示，白棋知道他将赢得对敌人国王的攻击，迫使黑棋要么交出更多的质，要么将死。
